0.post_text: Discover your very own #Ferrari history answering a few questions based on your personal experience. #Ferrari70

comments.message: Congratulations Ferrari I'm glad you are coming back

Italia ...il miglior paese ...seppur piccolo... dove si producono le auto e moto sportive più belle e potenti al mondo...non siamo secondi a nessuno gli altri paese hanno solo da imparare da una lunga tradizione motoristica come la nostra...Ferrari...Lamborghini...Maserati... Pagani...Alfaromeo....ducati...motoguzzi...aprilia...ect...per non parlare dei migliori designer...pininfarina...bertone...giugiaro....insomma non c'è ne per nessuno

11.post_text: Answer some quick questions and discover your personal #Ferrari history. #Ferrari70

12.post_text: Top view of our headquarter in #Maranello. #Ferrari

comments.message: The center of the automotive universe.
Be interesting to know what the average employee car is in the car park
The heart of prancing horses. Such a facility it is  a monument

I had a great trip there a few years ago with visit to the Maserati factory as well, all expenses paid including food, drink and hotel, in fact I didn't change any money to Euros at all. That's the way to treat customers, not like Spyker who wouldn't even let me on their stand at The Motor Show UK!
And everyone who works there drives a soccer mom car. Hilarious.
Ma hanno palesemente aumentato le dimensioni della scritta sulla dx o sbaglio? Davide Marcon
Tanguy Séverin un jour ça ressemblera à ça ton équipe dans MM :-P ou pas :-P
Questa eccellenza italiana la invidiano in tutto il mondo specialmente i tedeschi
Maranello...the place to be! Such a beautiful city for ferraristis! !!!
Grandioso...in una settimana forse riuscirei a visitare questa "eccellenza"..chissà!!!!!!!!

Needs a new modern look now I think.. especially being the best car company in the world.. sum thing like the McLaren headquarters.. but bigger and better.. however I still love the place and would love to come and see it for real.. one day .. hears to hope and sum luck in life..
If I get a job in Ferrari then I am the most happiest person in known and unknown universe.

14.post_text: Here’s the #Ferrari #512TR, a red masterpiece from the 90’s: http://bit.ly/Garage_Ferrari512TR #Ferrari70

comments.message:
Just 100% pure Ferrari. Pure petrol powered, no ugly hybrid or ugly electric power.
Forza Ferrari 🏎

Most beautiful car of the world ❤
I love it 💖
It looks like the car Gary drove in weird science.
I no who is a difference about this 2 testarossa andvthe 512 _S is the tyressnis more treit white another..
I never understood the difference between 512 TR and Testarossa...could someone explain me the difference?
I miss the days of the 512tr, testarossa, the 308, the 355, the countach, diablo, 90's Porsche 911 turbo.
My beautiful love. The first 12 cylinder in back position for Ferrari.
Me encanta las Ferrari sport incluso modelo testarozza

In comparison to the 993 Turbo this car is anything but a masterpiece :-) . No logic at all behind basic elements, a clock with an awful loud annoying sound and a driver seat that hurts your knees really don't make a master piece. The V12 is the only thing that's adorable but the 512 TR is only sth to drive once a week tops. At least in my opinion. Oh, and good luck driving it slowly, the clutch and steering wheel require quite some muscles ;-)
Florian Lbs la voiture a papa 😉
Ein großartiges Auto... War lange Jahre Fan vom Testarossa. Wunderschöne Formen und Linien...Wie immer bei FERRARI. Mille Grazie Signore Pininfarina R.I.P
Always wanted one. Great car that.
柵欄式"進氣口"就是"獨特"
Love the 512 but its not as striking as its origin the Testarossa monospecchio. That car debuting in Paris in 1984 was a turning point of radical supercar design.

What a gorgeous machine!
I've, frequently, seen it in reality at my university's car museum and I never got enough of looking at it.
